institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill competition management rules/Article 6 (Establishment and operation of city/provincial committees)
contents: Article 6 (Establishment and operation of city/provincial committees) ①The names and establishment organizations of city/provincial committees are as shown in Appendix 1. However, when additional city/provincial committees need to be established due to separation of administrative districts, etc., they may be integrated into other city/provincial committees or commissioned to operate them through consultation between local government heads, taking into account the establishment time, preparation period, and operational efficiency. ., ② Matters necessary for the organization and operation of city/provincial committees shall, in principle, follow the ordinances, guidelines, etc. set by the city/provincial governor. However, if there are no ordinances, guidelines, etc., the contents set forth in this rule may be applied.
